name: Rewind (itch) (Durhnevir)
description:
Rewind time and follow the footsteps of your dead friend. Find out what led to his tragic death by  backward.

Let the remanence of your friend help you to take his path backward by controlling his actions throughout the level.

We hope to add some content soon.

Team :
- Lucas Levy
- Arthur Othy-Gares
- Hugo Picolo

Made on Unreal Engine 4
